page.title: 07HIGH WYCOMBE FIRE STATION
page.content:
{High Wycombe Fire Station}has around 60 men.It mainly serves High Wycombe, Little Marlow, Amersham, Loudwater and Stokenchurch.
The system works efficiently. When{a {fire occurs,}someone{dials '999'.}The {operator}puts him or her through to the{fire station.}The person tells the fire officer{where the the fire is.}A fire officer will tell the other men {where to go and how many engines are {needed.}If the firemen do not know the location they will pick out a card with the name off a road from A to Z. When the engines are needed some {lights on the wall flash.}Each light has the initial of an engine on it, so the{firemen will know which engine will{rush out}of the the station and go and{fight the fire.
